content:
PersonalizationStateInfo Class

Definition

When overridden in a derived class, implements a representation of information about a set of Web Parts data for a page.

In this Article

public abstract class PersonalizationStateInfo
Inheritance
System.Object
PersonalizationStateInfo

Inherited Members

Equals(Object)
Equals(Object,Object)
GetHashCode()
GetType()
MemberwiseClone()
ReferenceEquals(Object,Object)
ToString()

Remarks

Classes that derive from PersonalizationStateInfo represent information about either a set of shared state data for a page or a set of per-user personalization state data for the page and a user. This class is intended for use in queries and management methods where the serialized Web Parts data is not necessary.

Properties

LastUpdatedDate

Gets the date and time that the personalization state was last updated.

public DateTime LastUpdatedDate { get; }
Value
DateTime

A DateTime indicating when the personalization state was last updated.

Remarks

This property provides the date and time that the shared or per-user personalization state information was last updated.

Path

Gets the path to the page associated with the personalization state information.

public string Path { get; }
Value
String

The path of the page associated with the personalization state information.

Remarks

The path is an application-relative path, such as ~/application/page/page.aspx.

Size

Gets the size of the personalization state information stored in the underlying data store.

public int Size { get; }
Value
Int32

The size, in bytes, of the personalization state information.

Remarks

For shared state information, size represents the size of the shared state in the data store. For per-user information, size represents the size of the per-user state for a specific user and page combination (determined by the Path property) as stored in the data store.
